CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 31, 1946, pg. 10, reads: "American Bridge Tournament Closes In Pittsburgh - Closing Saturday night in Pittsburgh was one of the most successful of all ABA gatherings, which drew some 500 bridge players to Pennsylvania to spend a week vying for honors...Part of the large Los Angeles contingent pose for the cameraman; Mrs. Viola Henry, Margarett Hale, Ellis Veils, Louise Clay, May Denton, Dr. A.L. Wallace, Beatrice Reeves, Mrs. Louisa Roan, Elizabeth Harris, J.D. Dunn and Louise Woods. - All photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, first row, from left: Viola Henry, Margaret Hale, Ellis Veils, Louise Clay, May Denton; second row: Dr. A. L. Wallace, Beatrice Reeves, Louisa Roan, Elizabeth Harris, J. D. Dunn, and Louise Woods, standing on steps of building for Thirteenth Annual Conference of the American Bridge Association
